name: LoginAfterRegister
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for student login and issues the token

Request payload must contain the following fields:

USERNAME : STRING
PASSWORD : STRING

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/students/login

raw 
  {
    "username": "student0nks0EP2frcNMPLUW@unisolve.org",
    "password": "wHm6eGCL7uFOArs="
}

Response:

200 - OK 

  {"status":200,"status_type":"success","message":"Login Successful","count":1,"data":[{"user_id":376,"name":"student0nks0EP2frcNMPLUW@unisolve.org","full_name":"student user","status":"ACTIVE","role":"STUDENT","token":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..dKiceQREgKgZ7N6gCrt43RumBIUhCREjm2WVG3eksqs","type":"Bearer","expire":"3d","team_id":"12433","mentor_id":null,"team_name":null}]}
